Increases the duration of White Wolf by $S$ seconds (bonus increased by number of set pieces equipped).
Reduces the cooldown of White Wolf by $S$ seconds and increases the damage multiplier from 25% to 50%.

Aerondight, The Sword of Destiny
White Wolf

Casting a sign while adrenaline is full will cause Geralt to temporarily trigger and awaken his untapped potential.In this state he is invincible for 5 seconds and then immune to all staggering effects. Also his vitality regenerates at 5% per second and all of his abilities deal 25% more damage for 10 seconds. Cannot be used again afterwords for 50 seconds. Slot Bonus: Geralt does not consume Adrenaline while White Wolf is active. All adrenaline is instead consumed when the effect ends.

Each blow generates charges which increase sword damage by $S$%. Charges are lost over time or when receiving damage. A fully-charged sword always deals critical hit damage and ignores defenses. Is effective against both humans and monsters.

If Geralt's Toxicity is above 0, each opponent killed increases critical hit chance, damage, attack power and spell power by $I$% for the duration of that fight. Can be applied up to 25 times. Slot Bonus: Butcher of Blaviken's effects last until Geralt meditates.
Geralt's Adrenaline Point loss upon taking damage is lowered by $I$% and increases his attack power by $I$%. Slot Bonus: Slot Bonus: If White Wolf is active, adds 10% additional damage reduction.

When Geralt's Adrenaline Points are at their maximum, critical hit damage against the targeted enemy type is increased by $I$%. Increases monster damage resistance by $I$%. Slot bonus: Increases monster damage resistance by 2 levels;
When Geralt consumes a mutagen decoction, his max Vitality is increased by $I$ for the decoction's effective duration. Increases Slashing, Piercing and Bludgeoning resistance by $I$%.
Extends effective duration of all mutagen decoctions that Geralt has consumed by $I$%.Increases poison damage resistance by $I$%. Slot Bonus: Increases poison resistance by 2 levels

Each of Geralt's Adrenaline points increase the chance of causing a brutal strike by $I$%. Brutal strikes increase overall critical hit damage bonuses by 25%. Increases critical hit damage by $I$% and increases damage resistance by $I$%. Slot Bonus: Increases Brutal Strike chance bonus for adrenaline by 50%.
Increases Geralt's Igni Sign intensity by $I$%. Also increases the chance Igni will apply burning by $I$%. Increases burning resistance by $I$%.

Increases Geralt's Yrden Sign intensity by $I$%. Increases elemental damage resistance by $I$%. Also increases Yrden's damaging effects by $I$%. Slot Bonus: Improves the damaging effect bonus by 1 ability level.
Butcher of Blaviken
Every known level 1 alchemy formula increases Geralt's maximum Toxicity by 1. Reduces mutagen decoction toxicity by 7.
Every known level 1 alchemy formula increases Geralt's maximum Toxicity by 1. Reduces mutagen decoction toxicity by 7.
Every known level 1 or 2 alchemy formula increases Geralt's maximum Toxicity by 1. Reduces mutagen decoction toxicity by 14.
Every known level 1, 2 or 3 alchemy formula increases Geralt's maximum Toxicity by 1. Reduces mutagen decoction toxicity by 21.

Geralt's damage from hits received while dodging are reduced by $I$%. Also increases bleed damage resistance by $I$% and overall damage reduction by $I$%. Slot Bonus: Increases bleed and damage resistance by an additional level.

Geralt instantly gains one Adrenaline Point when entering combat. The Adrenaline Points generated by sword blows are increased by $I$%. Each adrenaline point now also adds $I$% critical damage bonus. Slot Bonus: Increases all of Geralt's bleed damage effects inflicted by swords by $I$.
Violence

Increases Geralt's attack power by $I$% and critical hit damage by $I$% for all sword attacks. Also adds $I$% damage reduction against all attacks. Slot Bonus: If Geralt is in White Wolf mode, his attack speed is 10% faster. Also increases all other bonuses by 2 ability levels.

Increases Geralt's strong critical hit chance by $I$% and strong attack critical hit damage by $I$%. Strong attacks now crush enemy armor and reduce their damage resistance by $I$%. Slot Bonus: Increases critical damage and hit bonus by 1 level.

Increases Geralt's Sign Intensity by $I$%, attack power by $I$%, critical hit damage by $I$%. All enemies resistances are reduced by $I$% to all of Geralt's attacks. Also increases Burning Resistance by $I$%. Slot Bonus: Increases Burning resistance by an additional ability level and casting Igni will restore vitality to Geralt, based on 5% of the damage inflicted.
Increases Geralt's potion overdose threshold by $I$%. Reduces potion toxicity by $I$. Slot Bonus: Increases overdose threshold bonus by 1 level and toxicity reduction by 4.
Control Over The Power

Increases Geralt's damage resistance by $I$% to all attacks. Also increases sign intensity by $I$%. Adds $I$ shock damage to all attacks. Slot Bonus: Reduces Geralt's enemies resistances by $I$% and increases all other bonuses by 1 ability level.

Increases Geralt's damage resistance by $I$% to all attacks. Also increases sign intensity by $I$%. Adds $I$ shock damage to all attacks. Slot Bonus: Reduces Geralt's enemies resistances by $I$% and increases all other bonuses by 1 ability level. If White Wolf is active, Geralt will also cast a powerful Yrden Nova when he lays down a standard Yrden trap.

Increases Geralt's Yrden Sign duration by $I$ seconds. Number of alternate mode charges: $I$. Number of Standard mode traps: $I$. Enemies under the influence of Yrden lose $I$ point(s) of Vitality or Essence per second.

Geralt's strong attack damage increased by $I$%. Increases bludgeoning damage resistance by $I$%. Increases vitality by $I$%. Slot Bonus: Increases damage resistance bonus by one ability level.

Increases Geralt's damage reduction by $I$%, increases spell power by $I$% and attack power by $I$%. Also increases critical hit damage by $I$% and reduces enemy resistances by $I$%. Slot Bonus: Increases damage reduction and enemy resistance reduction by 1 ability level.

Geralt's Quen shield pushes opponents back when it breaks. Reflects $I$% absorbed damage back to the attacker.
Geralt's Quen shield pushes opponents back when it breaks. Reflects $I$% absorbed damage back to the attacker.
Geralt's Quen shield pushes opponents back and deals damage when it breaks. Reflects $I$% absorbed damage back to the attacker.
Geralt's Quen shield pushes opponents back and deals damage when it breaks with a chance for knock-down. Reflects $I$% absorbed damage back to the attacker.
Each bolt Geralt fires that hits its target adds $F$ Adrenaline Points. Increases critical hit damage by $I$%.
Geralt's Battle Trance now increases critical hit chance by $I$%, an additional $I$% critical hit damage and $I$% attack power per Adrenaline Point

Target does not move towards Geralt while he is casting Axii. Increases the effectiveness of Axii in dialogues. Reduces Axii casting time. Axii can now be used on two opponents at the same time. Slot Bonus: Quadruples the amount of Crowns that Geralt receives from Quests and Gwent.

Increases Geralt's total sign intensity by $I$% and attack power by $I$%. Also reduces enemy resistances by $I$%. Slot Bonus: Casting Axii in combat will shield Geralt in Frost Armor, which reduces the next foe's attack by 25%. Frost Armor lasts until combat ends.

Increases Geralt's total sign intensity by $I$% and attack power by $I$%. Also reduces enemy resistances by $I$%. Slot Bonus: Casting Axii in combat will shield Geralt in Frost Armor, which reduces the next foe's attack by 25%. Frost Armor lasts until combat ends.

Increases Geralt's maximum Vitality by $I$% when Toxicity exceeds the safe threshold. Also increases damage reduction by $I$%. Slot Bonus: Increases damage reduction by 2 levels.
Infatigable Mutagen

Powerful Mutagen designed by Geralt himself, in spirit of the Wolf School. Increases White Wolf's invulnerbility duration to 10 seconds. In addition, Geralt does not use stamina when jumping or sprinting outside combat.
Gain 50% to Attack and Sign Power, +5/s to Stamina regeneration and +25% to Adrenaline gain while health is at 20% or lower. Resets when health is regained and at the end of combat. 10s cooldown.
On casting a sign in combat, increases stamina regeneration by 1% and sign power by 1%, up to a maximum of 50%. The effect lasts for the duration of the decoction or until meditating.
White Wolf
White Wolf Is On Cooldown
Solide Mutagen
Powerful mutagen designed by the Bear School Witchers. Adds 3% damage reduction against all attacks after all other damage reduction is applied.
Hexer Mutagen

Powerful Mutagen designed by the Griffon School Witchers. Casting the standard Axiii sign will inflict 400 damage on an enemy and restore vitality based on 1% of the damage inflicted. The damage amount is increased by Geralt's level and Axii Sign intensity.

Time is slowed by an additional $I$% while aiming the crossbow. Also increases Geralts crossbow damage by $I$% (scales with character level). Also increases Geralt's critical hit chance by $I$% and critical hit damage by $I$% with crossbows. Crossbow critical hits also now disable monster special abilities for $I$ seconds. Slot Bonus: Increases attack power and critical hit damage by an additional level.
When Geralt's Vitality reaches 0, it will be restored with a bonus of 25%. Requires at least 1 Adrenaline Point, which will be consumed. Slot Bonus: Adds $I$% damage reduction.

When Geralt's Vitality reaches 0, Adrenaline Points will immediately be consumed to restore it, with a bonus of $I$%. The amount restored is based on the number of Adrenaline Points used. If no Adrenaline Points are available, a small portion of Vitality will be restored. Slot Bonus: Adds $I$% damage reduction.

When Vitality reaches 0, Adrenaline Points will immediately be consumed to restore it, with a bonus of $I$%. The amount restored is based on the number of Adrenaline Points used. If no Adrenaline Points are available, a small portion of Vitality will be restored. If Geralt has White Wolf at level 3, it will be activated instead (regardless of whether or not it is on cooldown). Slot Bonus: Adds $I$% damage reduction.

Casting a sign while adrenaline is full will cause Geralt to temporarily trigger and awaken his untapped potential. In this state he is invincible for 5 seconds and then immune to all staggering effects. Also his vitality regenerates at 5% per second and all of his abilities deal 25% more damage for 15 seconds. Cannot be used again afterwords for 50 seconds. Slot Bonus: Geralt does not consume Adrenaline while White Wolf is active. All adrenaline is instead consumed when the effect ends.

Casting a sign while adrenaline is full will cause Geralt to temporarily trigger and awaken his untapped potential. In this state he is invincible for 5 seconds and then immune to all staggering effects. Also his vitality regenerates at 5% per second and all of his abilities deal 25% more damage for 20 seconds. This effect will now also be triggered in place of any effects granted by abilities that are used when Geralt's life reaches zero. Cannot be used again afterwords for 50 seconds. Slot Bonus: Geralt does not consume Adrenaline while White Wolf is active. All adrenaline is instead consumed when the effect ends.

Geralt's Strong Attack damage is increased by $I$%. Increases bludgeoning damage resistance by $I$%. Increases vitality by $I$% and brutal strike chance by $I$%. Slot Bonus: Increases damage resistance and brutal strike bonus by one ability level.

Increases Aard sign intensity by $I$% and adds $I$ Force Damage and $I$ Frost Damage to Aard. Also grants $I$ Force damage to all of Geralts attacks. Damage bonuses scale with Geralt's level. Slot Bonus: Doubles Aard damage effects and increses the Force Damage bonus for Geralt's attacks by 1 ability level.

Allows Geralt to use a powerful heavy sword attack that deals up to $I$% damage in proportion to the Stamina consumed. Ignores enemy Defense and increases critical hit chance by $I$%. Adrenaline Points increase total damage by $I$%. Geralt is shielded by an Exploding Quen shield momentarily while using Rend. Slot Bonus: If White Wolf is active, Rend releases a powerful wave of the 5th Element that deals additional damage and slows enemies.

Adrenaline Points increase total damage by $I$%. Geralt is shielded by an Exploding Quen shield momentarily while using Rend.  Slot Bonus: If White Wolf is active, Rend releases a powerful wave of the 5th Element that deals additional damage and slows enemies.

Geralt's Adrenaline Point loss upon taking damage is lowered by $I$%. Also increases attack power by $I$%. Now also adds $I$% damage reduction per Adrenaline Point. Slot Bonus: Doubles the effect of the damage reduction and if White Wolf is active, adds 10% additional damage reduction.
Silny Mutagen Formula

A powerful and strange Mutagen that Geralt discovered from Moreau's experiments. Only Geralt is capable of surviving its effects. If Geralt consumes this Mutagen, he will undergo a powerful, spontanious mutation. Increases Geralt's ability points by 1.
Silny Mutagen

Increases Geralt's strong critical hit chance by $I$% and strong attack critical hit damage by $I$%. Strong attacks now crush enemy armor and reduce their damage resistance by $I$%. Also increses brutal strike chance by $I$%. Slot Bonus: Increases brutal strike chance by 2, critical damage and hit bonus by 1 level.

Geralt's fast attack damage increased by $I$%. Also increses the chance of landing a fast attack critical hit by $I$% and fast attack critical damage is incresed by $I$%. Slot Bonus: Increases critical damage bonus by an additional level.
Firey Dancer

The Fast Style, also known as "Addan Aenye, the Firey Dancer", according to Lambert. This is one of the core components of the Wolf School's training. Fast Style sword abilities allow Geralt to execute fast blows in quick succession, sacrificing damage potency for speed. Fast attacks are advantageous against agile opponents and even larger ones since they leave them with little time to retaliate. They however have difficulty versus foes who are heavily armored or using shields.

The Strong Style, also known as "The Temerian Devil", according to Lambert. This is one of the core components of the Wolf School's training. Strong attacks allow Geralt to execute hard and heavy blows with his sword, dealing more damage in a single blow than with those of the fast style, at the expense of speed. It is ideal for when facing large foes or those that are heavily armored or using shields. While it is not as useful versus quick foes due to the fact that they can dodge the attacks easily, it can be devestating when used against them as well.
Temerian Devil
Sinister

Geralt's fast attacks now have a $I$% chance to blind opponents, causing them to be completely vulnerble to critical hits and also disabling their ability to counter attacks and parry. Also increases critical hit damage by $I$%. Slot Bonus: If White Wolf is active, Geralt's fast attacks inflict a 20% slowdown effect on opponents for 5s.
Repere Mutagen
Powerful Mutagen designed by the Cat School Witchers. Reduces the stamina cost of actions that consume stamina by 20%.
Increases Aard sign intensity by $I$% and adds $I$ Force Damage and $I$ Frost Damage to Aard. Damage bonuses scale with Geralt's level. Slot Bonus: Doubles Aard damage effects.
Increases Aard sign intensity by $I$% and adds $I$ Force Damage to Aard. Damage bonus scales with Geralt's level. Slot Bonus: Doubles Aard damage effect.

Target does not move towards Geralt while he is casting Axii. Increases the effectiveness of Axii in dialogues. Reduces Axii casting time. Slot Bonus: Triples the amount of crowns that Geralt receives from Quests and Gwent.

Improves Geralt's horse back riding abilities so that he can fast travel using Roach without the need of sign posts. Also increases the stamina of Roach or any other horse by $F$ while Geralt is on horse back. Slot Bonus: Increases Geralt's attack power by $I$% while he is on horse back.
Wolven Crossbow Mastery
Utility

Geralt, being a Witcher of the Wolf School, has been trained in the arts of utilizing the cross bow, horse back riding and of course, monster slaying. Being the best of the best, Geralt is able to further his mastery of these abilities.
Horseback Training

After a successful counterattack, Geralt's next attack deals +$I$% damage per level. Also increases damage resistance by $I$%. Slot bonus: Increases damage by an additional ability level and if Geralt is in White Wolf mode, his counter attacks cost no stamina.

After a successful counterattack, Geralt's next attack deals +$I$% damage per level with a chance of knockdown based on the number of Adrenaline Points. Also increases damage resistance by $I$%. Slot bonus: Increases damage by an additional ability level and if Geralt is in White Wolf mode, his counter attacks cost no stamina.

After a successful counterattack, Geralt's next attack is a critical hit with +$I$% damage per level with a chance of knockdown based on the number of Adrenaline Points. Also increases damage resistance by $I$%. Slot bonus: Increases damage by an additional ability level and if Geralt is in White Wolf mode, his counter attacks cost no stamina.

Geralt's Fast Attacks now also can cause enemies to bleed. While bleeding, enemies lose $I$ life points per second for $I$ seconds. Slot Bonus: White Wolf's damage multiplier effects damage over time effects.

Allows Geralt to use a group sword attack that strikes all surrounding foes, with a 15% damage penalty per hit. Maintaining the attack consumes Stamina and Adrenaline. Consumes $I$% less Stamina and Adrenaline. Slot Bonus: If White Wolf is active, consumes 25% less stamina.

Allows Geralt to use a group sword attack that strikes all surrounding foes, with a 10% damage penalty per hit. Maintaining the attack consumes Stamina and Adrenaline. Consumes $I$% less Stamina and Adrenaline. Slot Bonus: If White Wolf is active, consumes 25% less stamina.

Allows Geralt to use a group sword attack that strikes all surrounding foes, with a 5% damage penalty per hit. Maintaining the attack consumes Stamina and Adrenaline. Consumes $I$% less Stamina and Adrenaline. Slot Bonus: If White Wolf is active, consumes 25% less stamina.

Increases Geralt's Igni Sign intensity by $I$%. Also increases the chance Igni will apply burning by $I$%. Increases burning resistance by $I$%. Now adds $I$ fire damage to all of Geralt's attacks (increases with character level). Slot Bonus: Increases fire damage bonus by 1 ability level.
Blessing Of Fire
Blade oils increase Geralt's armor by $I$ against the foes that they target. The armor bonus scales with Geralt's level. Slot Bonus: Increases the armor amount by 2 levels.
Increases the maximum number of bombs Geralt can carry by $I$. Slot Bonus: Adds 2 additional levels.

If Geralt drinks a potion, he has a $I$% chance of activiating the effects of another randomly selected potion, without additional toxicity cost. Slot Bonus: Doubles the duration of the random potion.

Geralt, being a Witcher of the Wolf School, has been trained in various combat defensive techniques. These range from utilizing a Witcher's sword to deflect arrows and blows, dodging or utilizing one's own body to properly absorb damage.
Increases Quen Sign Intensity by $I$ and all damage resistances by $I$.

Blessing Of Water

The Sword of Destiny, fully realized. While it is too powerful to enchant, each blow generates charges which increase sword damage by $S$%. Charges are lost over time or when receiving damage. A fully-charged sword always deals critical hit damage and ignores defenses. It is effective against both humans and monsters. Also extends the range of Whirl and Rend.

Increases Geralt's Axii sign intensity by $I$ and adds $I$ Frost Damage to all of Geralt's attacks. Slot Bonus: Increases the Frost Damage bonus by 1 ability level.

Powerful Mutagen designed by the Manticore School Witchers.Adds a 5% chance to cause poisoning to all of Geralt's attacks.
Increases Geralt's weapon damage resistance by $I$%. Also allows Geralt to deflect arrows while parrying. Slot Bonus: Increases weapon damage resistance by 1 ability level.

Increases Geralt's weapon damage resistance by $I$%. Also allows Geralt to reflect arrows back at the attacker with a perfectly timed parry. Slot Bonus: Increases weapon damage resistance by 1 ability level.

Increases Geralt's overall attack power against monsters by $I$%. Also increases Geralt's resistances to Bleeding, Poison and Burning effects by $I$%. Slot Bonus: Increases bonuses by 1 ability level.
When Geralt detonates a bomb, it will split into explosive fragments. Number of fragments: $I$.  Slot Bonus: Increases ability level by 2.

Increases the bonus Geralt receives from mutagens placed in mutagen slots by $I$%. Slot Bonus: Adds additional bonuses for mutagens (Blue increases Stamina Regeneration, Red increases Adrenaline Generation and Green increases Armor).

Geralt creates a concentrated magical trap that emits energy blasts of the 5th Element towards any enemies that come within $I$ yards of it. These blasts inflict $I$ damage (scales with Geralt's level) per hit and also inflicts Yrden's slow effect. The effects are further enhanced by Yrden's Sign Intensity. The trap is also capable of destroying any projectiles that pass through its area of effect.
Pyromaniac

Unlocks Geralt's mastery of the power of fire, bestowing the following enhancements: Adds $S$ to Igni's fire damage and it now combusts in a 360 degree radius. Quen is now imbued with the power of fire, granting it a fire shield that deals damage back to attackers and deflects arrows.

Increases the range of Geralt's Aard sign effect by $I$ yard(s). Slot Bonus: If White Wolf is active, Aard will be imbued with the power of the 5th Element, allowing it to deal damage to Geralt's opponents.

Allows Geralt to use Igni to emit a continuous stream of fire that damages enemies. The damage of the stream scales with Geralt's level. Slot Bonus: The stream produces a beam of intense heat that increases the range of the fire stream and increases the damage by 50%.

Allows Geralt to use Igni to emit a continuous stream of fire that damages enemies. The damage of the stream scales with Geralt's level. The stamina cost of maintaing the stream is reduced by $I$%.  Slot Bonus: The stream produces a beam of intense heat that increases the range of the fire stream and increases the damage by 100%.

Allows Geralt to use Igni to emit a continuous stream of fire that damages enemies. The damage of the stream scales with Geralt's level. The stamina cost of maintaing the stream is reduced by $I$%.  Slot Bonus: The stream produces a beam of intense heat that increases the range of the fire stream and increases the damage by 150%.
